Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28506 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-28506 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package giflib is earlier than 5.2.1-7, affected by CVE-2022-28506
